title: How to Complete The Magic Begins in LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1–4

steps.headline: Allow Hagrid to be in the main control.
steps.description: Harry Potter will not have knowledge of spells nor magic until his first year.

steps.headline: Grab the door handle from the top of the staircase.
steps.description: In the back right corner, have Harry stand on the beige floor tiles. Use the Wingardium Leviosa spell on the tiles, which will lift Harry up. Change the controls to Harry and go up the staircase. Have Harry grab the handle, drop down, and use it on the door.

steps.headline: Open the door using Hagrid.
steps.description: Use Wingardium Leviosa on the door and go through.

steps.headline: Use Wingardium Leviosa on the block pieces on the ground.
steps.description: This will complete the wall and allow you to enter Diagon Alley. Diagon Alley is where you can claim game extras, such as gold bricks, spells, and other useful items.

steps.headline: Walk to the end of the alley and find a cauldron.
steps.description:
Use your "special" button to grab the following items and place them in the cauldron:
Ice cream bar: Near the food booth
Spider Potion: Examine the spiderweb on the left
Flowers: Table on the right

steps.headline: Pull the chain using Hagrid.
steps.description: The cauldron will explode and lead you to another doorway. Have Hagrid stand in the circle and pull the chain. This will lead you to the Gringott's Bank.

steps.headline: Walk to the goblin (Griphook) in the far middle.
steps.description: Stand in the circle and motion a wave to him. Have Griphook open the locked doorway in the middle section of the bankers.

steps.headline: Use Hagrid to open the gate by pulling the chain.
steps.description: Open the vault using Griphook. Switch back to Hagrid so you can use Wingardium Leviosa on the fallen bricks.

steps.headline: Go to the painting that has the goblin in it.
steps.description: Position yourself so you can wave to him. He will open a new passage to the vault.

steps.headline: Walk to the left side.
steps.description: Using Hagrid, pull the chain by going around and behind the dragon. Switch to Griphook to open the vault. Enter the vault to come to a cut-scene.

steps.headline: Get Harry a wand.
steps.description: Notice that you'll be back in Diagon Alley. Walk a bit to Ollivander's shop on the right (there will be a huge blue arrow pointing to the door). Walk in to complete the chapter.

text:
Allow Hagrid to be in the main control. Harry Potter will not have knowledge of spells nor magic until his first year. Grab the door handle from the top of the staircase. In the back right corner, have Harry stand on the beige floor tiles. Use the Wingardium Leviosa spell on the tiles, which will lift Harry up. Change the controls to Harry and go up the staircase. Have Harry grab the handle, drop down, and use it on the door. Open the door using Hagrid. Use Wingardium Leviosa on the door and go through. Use Wingardium Leviosa on the block pieces on the ground. This will complete the wall and allow you to enter Diagon Alley. Diagon Alley is where you can claim game extras, such as gold bricks, spells, and other useful items. Walk to the end of the alley and find a cauldron. Use your "special" button to grab the following items and place them in the cauldron:
Ice cream bar: Near the food booth
Spider Potion: Examine the spiderweb on the left
Flowers: Table on the right Pull the chain using Hagrid. The cauldron will explode and lead you to another doorway. Have Hagrid stand in the circle and pull the chain. This will lead you to the Gringott's Bank. Walk to the goblin (Griphook) in the far middle. Stand in the circle and motion a wave to him. Have Griphook open the locked doorway in the middle section of the bankers. Use Hagrid to open the gate by pulling the chain. Open the vault using Griphook. Switch back to Hagrid so you can use Wingardium Leviosa on the fallen bricks. Go to the painting that has the goblin in it. Position yourself so you can wave to him. He will open a new passage to the vault. Walk to the left side. Using Hagrid, pull the chain by going around and behind the dragon. Switch to Griphook to open the vault. Enter the vault to come to a cut-scene. Get Harry a wand. Notice that you'll be back in Diagon Alley. Walk a bit to Ollivander's shop on the right (there will be a huge blue arrow pointing to the door). Walk in to complete the chapter.
